name: nimtable
description: Nimtable is a minimal self-hosted spreadsheet app written in Nim. It provides a lightweight interface for editing and organizing simple tabular data in the browser.

features.title: Spreadsheet Interface
features.description: Edit tabular data in a familiar grid layout with rows and columns

features.title: Cell Editing
features.description: Click to edit cells with support for text, numbers, and formulas

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage ideal for low-power servers or embedded systems

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Written in Nim for efficient execution and quick response times

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Load and save data in CSV or other common spreadsheet formats
